name: Souls Remaster
overview: This game is inspired in Dark Souls (From Software ps3, 360, PC). The Souls, in Dark Souls they were very useful, but in this game they will only raise your level. Gather enough Souls and you will raise your level. If you get killed, the gathered Souls will be lost, and in order to recover them, you will have to go back to the same screen where you got killed. If you are killed on the way, you will not be able to recover the ones you were looking for, but you will be able to recover the ones you just lost.
